alert.note: Alert for Crittenden; Graves; Livingston; Lyon; Marshall; McCracken (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 18 at 9:40AM EDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southern Livingston, south central Crittenden, Marshall, southeastern McCracken, northeastern Graves and western Lyon Counties through 930 AM CDT... At 839 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Reidland to near Mayfield. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Reidland around 845 AM CDT. Ledbetter around 850 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Benton, Calvert City, Eddyville and Land Between The Lakes Area. This includes the following highways... Interstate 24 in Kentucky between Mile Markers 10 and 41. Interstate 69 in Kentucky between Mile Markers 27 and 51. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Crittenden; Graves; Livingston; Lyon; Marshall; McCracken
